Articles.Content:
Voyager Nation founded a space program so they could be the most advanced nation. The race between Voyager Nation, Kerbal Union, and United States of Kerbica was started by the launch of Sentinel 1. PE:103,765 AP:105,995

(I will try to update as often as possible)

Edited October 1, 2015 by Voyager275
Funny, my space program is called Kerbal Union.

Sentinel 2 followed Sentinel 1 into orbit 30 days later. It was the first spacecraft to use solar panels to produce electricity.

PE:131,703 AP:133,212

While going into orbit, the rocket did get very hot, prompting a 20A alarm(overheat warning), but the satellite survived.

30 days after Sentinel 2, Sentinel 3 became the final Sentinel satellite in orbit

This satellite was designed to do science in orbit, and the seismometer was used to record Launchpad data. Good end to the Sentinel Program

PE:157,129 AP:158,490

juicy science!

Give some love to manned (Or Kerbaled) designs.

Like a gol' ol' Vostokk missions.

juicy science!

Give some love to manned (Or Kerbaled) designs.

Like a gol' ol' Vostokk missions.

Soon, very soon

First Kerbal In Space!

Sidski Kerman snuck onboard a orbital capsule test(Dawn 1) and flew into orbit this morning. PE:112,275 AP:116,450

Quote from Sidski:"I decided, why not go into space today and quicken the kerbal exploration process."

Edited October 1, 2015 by Voyager275
I am discontinuing this thread. Check out this one for a space race between me and Sampa http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/135513-Space-Race-%28Note-to-Moderators-not-an-RP-type-thread%29
